item.title: About
item.author: jordan.clayton@torontomu.ca (Jordan Clayton)
item.description: About Me: Hi! I’m Jordan and I like to make things. I also really love video games. I’m an aspiring developer based in Hamilton, Ontario (Canada) and am currently studying Computer Science at Toronto Metropolitan University. I’m interested in mobile and desktop development, low-level programming, and am planning to start learning more about compilers.

item.title: Resume
item.author: jordan.clayton@torontomu.ca (Jordan Clayton)
item.description: Complete Resume (pdf) Technical Skills Languages | Dart, C, Rust, Java, Python, Bash, SQL Tooling | Vim, VSCode, Android Studio Technologies | Linux, Flutter, Supabase, GitHub, Pandas, WordPress, LaTeX Education Honors Bachelor of Science (BSc): Computer Science Sep. 2022 - Exp. 2027 Toronto Metropolitan University (Formerly Ryerson) CGPA: 4.17 / 4.33 Alumni Award: Best combined performance in CPS 213 and CPS 310 (Computer Organization I & II, awarded 2024) Dean's List (2022-2023) Relevant Coursework Object-Oriented Programming Unix & C Programming Data Structures & Algorithms Computer Architecture & Organization Comparative Programming Languages Work Experience IFS Ontario Jul.
